official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study relating to flood and related problems along the San Francisco Bay shoreline.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study relating to flood and related problems along the San Francisco Bay shoreline.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study relating to flood and related problems along the San Francisco Bay shoreline.
